testcase.name: Clicking on a text value opens a text editor-smartfilter
Clicking close shuts the editor-smartfilter
Clicking accept updates the value-smartfilter
Clicking on a numeric value opens a text editor-smartfilter
Clicking close shuts the numeric editor-smartfilter
Clicking accept updates the numeric value-smartfilter
Clicking on a date value opens a date editor-smartfilter
Clicking close shuts the date editor-smartfilter
Clicking accept updates the date value-smartfilter
Clicking on a boolean value toggles between true and false-smartfilter

failure.message: editing.spec.ts:294:3 Clicking on a boolean value toggles between true and false-smartfilter
